::Grounded::
Grounded finished his search and continued work...hooking himself up
to a makeshift DNA transhifter....There was a gigantic boom as the
machine blew up but not before doing it's job....
Grounded walked out of the lab in his new beast form somewhat covered
in dark ash and a little shaken..
He came out and was now a large mole...He was about four feet long.
His head was brown and farther down his body it mixed into a forest
green...
He transformed into his robot mode standing the same hieght he had the
same weapons but he had reconfigured his deploybles to jsut be little
green balls.  His one characteristic he kept was his ability to use
nature to his advantage. He walked to where he said he would meet
Windlord...


--- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> Nightlight:
>

> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:

> >     "Yes for such a young Predacon she does seem to want to protect
> us a lot.
> >  She was reprogrammed as a Pred.  I think her previous maximal

> needs help
> > but she refuses it.  All we can do is protect her."
